subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Memphis’s Zach Randolph was fined $25,000 for criticizing the referees who sent Houston’s James Harden to the foul line 25 times Thursday night.
snippet: Memphis’s Zach Randolph was fined $25,000 for criticizing the referees who sent Houston’s James Harden to the foul line 25 times Thursday night.
